notes: shadcn Input is a minimal styled input; vlting Input includes label, helper text, and error states
vlting uses onChangeText (Tamagui/React Native pattern) instead of onChange; receives text string directly
vlting adds size prop (sm, md, lg) controlling height, padding, border-radius, and label font size
vlting adds leadingSlot and trailingSlot for icons or buttons inside the input row
Built on @tamagui/input; supports focus-visible outline styling
Auto-generates IDs for label-input association and aria-describedby for helper/error text
Also exposes Input.Frame, Input.Label, Input.Helper as lower-level styled components

breaking.vlting: Use Tamagui style props or size/error props

breaking.reason: Cross-platform; receives text string, not event object

breaking.vlting: Use label, error, errorMessage, helperText props
